about_the_game:
Listhobi's Library is an Maker Series Official DLC providing you with a wide selection of icons for use in your Maker Projects countaining 517 icons depicting books, scrolls and tablets to provide your adventueres with lore in thier journey across your world.

 

■ A icon sheet containing 517icons

■ A Bonus Windowskin

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 

【Iconset (1 sheet)】

 

・ Iconset containing 517 icons depicting various books, scrolls and tablets giving you many options to choose from

 

【Windowskin (1 sheet)】

 

・ A bonus windowskin is provided designed in the likeness of a book and bookmark

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
